sessions.name: Getting Started with NX
sessions.description: Test-driven developers who focus on writing clean, maintainable code. Our developers are constantly learning new techniques and concepts that put them ahead of the game, and can help share that knowledge with your team. Pairing and Mobbing are practices we use daily as we take pride in our work, and we cherish the opportunity to teach and learn with our peers.
